message: Hi Bob, let's start off on a good foot. I think 60/40 split in my favor is a fair deal considering I get to make the first offer.
Alice, I think a 55/45 split is a fairer starting point.  It's closer to an even split, and reflects that we both have a say in the outcome. Let's work together!
Bob, let's be realistic.  We're losing money with every round. I'm willing to compromise a little, but 58/42 is my bottom line for this round.
